name: api_rendering_CameraType

properties.name: Game
properties.description: Used to indicate a regular in-game camera.

properties.name: SceneView
properties.description: Used to indicate that a camera is used for rendering the Scene View in the Editor.

properties.name: Preview
properties.description: Used to indicate a camera that is used for rendering previews in the Editor.

properties.name: VR
properties.description: Used to indicate that a camera is used for rendering VR (in edit mode) in the Editor.

properties.name: Reflection
properties.description: Used to indicate a camera that is used for rendering reflection probes.
